footer.brandDescription: We make luxury private jet travel accessible through smart technology and empty leg flights.

hero.title: About Jetleg
hero.subtitle: We revolutionize private jet travel by making empty leg flights accessible and affordable for everyone.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.paragraph1: Jetleg was founded with a simple but powerful mission: to democratize luxury travel. We believe everyone should be able to enjoy the benefits of private jet travel, without the traditional high costs.
mission.paragraph2: By utilizing empty leg flights - flights that would otherwise fly empty - we offer our customers the opportunity to travel in style at a fraction of the normal price.
mission.paragraph3: Our technology connects travelers directly with available flights, creating both economic and ecological benefits.

safety.title: Safety first
safety.description: We only work with certified operators that meet the highest safety standards.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: Every flight is handled with the greatest attention to detail and service.

customerCentric.title: Customer-centric
customerCentric.description: Our customers are at the center of everything we do, from booking to aftercare.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: We make luxury travel accessible by optimally utilizing unused capacity.

xavier.name: Xavier Verhoestraete
xavier.description: With 15 years of experience in aviation, Xavier led the revolution in private jet travel.

carley.name: Carley Hamaway
carley.description: Carley develops the technology that makes our platform so user-friendly.

marc.name: Marc Dubois
marc.description: Marc ensures that every flight runs perfectly, from booking to landing.

cta.title: Ready to start your next adventure?
cta.subtitle: Discover our available flights and experience for yourself why thousands of travelers choose Jetleg.
